alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex; Western Clinton; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 12 at 10:13PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...Heavy snow will impact portions of the northern Champlain Valley and northern Vermont through 1115 PM EST... At 1011 PM EST, heavy snow was reported along a line extending from Westfield to near Fairfield to 6 miles southeast of Clayburg. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Visibility less than a mile. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Low visibility and snow covered roads may pose a hazard to motorists. Locations impacted include... Essex Junction, Burlington International Airport, Newport City, South Burlington, Burlington, Peru, Willsboro, Morrisville, Orleans, Derby Center, Charleston, Jay, Newport Town, Cambridge, Montgomery Center, Albany, Westford, Colchester, Essex Junction Village, and Georgia. This includes the following highways... Interstate 87 between mile markers 130 and 148. Interstate 89 between mile markers 74 and 112. Interstate 91 between mile markers 156 and 177.
info.instruction: Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex; Western Clinton; Western Essex
